lines.text: I come to visit this place every so often and I talk to Ray - like a dead person - I don't expect an answer and I do tell him what's on my heart, still. I would like to call certain people murderers. I feel that they murdered Ray. I just wish it never happened.

People don't know what it's like to have to open your whole life after you've had a horrible experience like this. I lost... I'm an only child and Ray was like a brother. We weren't looking for an easy way out. We obviously thought there was something better.
